settings.title: How We Build Our Bikes
settings.subtitle: Learn how your bike gets to you!

settings.title: Bike Assembly
settings.content: The biggest thing that sets Boogie Bikes apart from other ebike companies is that we hand-assemble all of our bikes, taking time to conduct quality-checks on each of the components as we build each bike. We want to ensure that each bike that we ship out is up to our standards, rather than some distant factory's standards.

settings.quote_text: We test ride each and every bike to ensure we didn't miss anything

settings.title: Packaging
settings.text: Sending a bicycle in the mail can be tricky... that's why we package the bike with plenty of padding specifically designed to prevent damage to the vulnerable parts of the bike. We also use pool noodles and recycled plastic as packaging instead of bulky and wasteful foam bats!

settings.title: Shipping
settings.text: We put a TV on the box so handlers will be more careful with the box

settings.title: Build Facility and Service Center
settings.description: We are always happy to help out with any of our products. If you are in Eastern Wisconsin you can get expert level factory service. Just give us a call to set up an appointment, we will take it from there!

settings.title: Online Library
settings.job_title: DO IT YOURSELF (WITH A LITTLE HELP)
settings.description: A great way to tackle general maintenance and repair, our YouTube channel has tons of useful videos. From un-boxing to fixing a flat, we have you covered. Don't see what you need, request it! (Check out our Manual Here)

settings.title: Work Through It Together
settings.description: We love to hear from our customers, and love helping them out. Whether it's routine maintenance or damage repair, call us and we will help you figure out what can be done to get you back on the road. 833-266-4432 or service@boogiebikes.com

settings.title: Local Bike Shop
settings.job_title: WE CAN HELP YOU FIND HELP
settings.description: Most qualified local bike shops can offer a lot of the services needed for a Boogie Bike. We'd love to help you find the right partner to help you. Give us your location and we will try to find a great place for you to bring your great bike.

settings.title: Boogie Bikes - Service & Support Offerings
settings.text:
A great bike needs great service. From our concierge phone service to our online library, we aim to help you keep your bike in great condition.

(YouTube Help Channel Here)

(Download the latest Manual Here)

settings.title: How do I update to the latest version of the software?
settings.subtitle: Always install the latest software version in order to enjoy your product's latest features. Updates are easy using our Beoplay mobile app. Inside the app, the download icon indicates that the latest version is available for download. Click it to automatically download the update.

settings.title: How can I connect my Seoul speaker to PC/MAC?
settings.subtitle: You can use any USB Type-C cable to connect your Seoul speakers to your PC/MAC. This cable runs from the computer's USB outlet (depending on how old your device is, you may need to purchase an adapter) to the line-in socket of your Seoul speaker.

settings.title: Why doesn’t the automatic play/pause function work properly?
settings.subtitle: Our app does not currently support our older products. Use the touchpad on H9i or the middle button on H8i to control the play/pause function. The way you wear the headphone will also affect the functionality of the automatic play/pause.

settings.title: How do I pair my Bluetooth device with my B&O PLAY Bluetooth speaker?
settings.subtitle: First, switch your device and B&O PLAY Bluetooth speaker on. Then press the Bluetooth button on the B&O PLAY Bluetooth speaker for more than 2 seconds. When the product indicator starts flashing blue, find the B&O PLAY Bluetooth speaker in the Bluetooth list on your device and select it. When a sound prompt is heard on the speaker and the product indicator turns solid blue, the two are paired.

settings.title: What should I do if I can't connect my device to my Beoplay A1?
settings.subtitle:
If you're experiencing an issue connecting the Beoplay A1 to your device, checkout the documentation and solutions below:

Interference with the Bluetooth signal – Bluetooth operates in the 2402 to 2480 MHz range and may be disturbed by other 2.4 GHz networks (e.g. WiFi routers and networks, wireless keyboards, mouse, etc). Turn off or remove other Bluetooth connections in the surrounding area, then try connecting again. Alternatively, go to another location, such as an elevator or outside, that has less Bluetooth noise from other products to test your connection.

Distance between the E8 and Bluetooth device - Face the front of your product towards the Bluetooth transmitting device (max distance is 10 meters and line-of-sight). Note that the Bluetooth antenna must be in your right earbud.

E8 Bluetooth receiver in the right earbud – If you wear a sports watch (e.g. an Apple watch) on your left wrist and are experiencing dropout issues, we recommended moving the watch to your right wrist.

settings.title: How can I reset my Seoul speaker and remove all paired Bluetooth devices?
settings.subtitle: To remove all paired devices from any of our speakers, press and hold the Bluetooth button and the power button simultaneously for more than 3 seconds. This resets the speaker to factory settings and the speaker will be in pairing mode when you turn it back on.

settings.text: Hand assembled with attention to quality for every part

settings.custom_html:
FAQs

What's the big deal about being built in the USA?

Internationally assembled bikes have up-charged automated quality control. When we assemble the bikes here in the U.S. we can hand-check the bikes to our higher standard and eliminate the middle man, offering a more competitive price and a higher quality bike.

​ How much does the bike weigh?

The entire bike weighs approximately 55 lbs.

​ How much can the bike support?

Our bike can hold up to a 300lb payload riding in normal conditions

​ If I order today, when will I get my bike?

We are currently shipping bikes 2 weeks out from order date.

​ What's the height range of the bike?

Riders from 5' to 6'6" can fit on the bike with seat adjustment.​

​ What's the wheel size?

Our premium Whitewall wheels are 26” and 2.25” wide making them suitable for a wide variety of conditions with supreme comfort and handleability.

​ Does it arrive fully assembled?

While we fully assemble the bike to make sure it meets our quality standards, customers will have to put on the finishing touches of putting on the handlebars, twisting on the pedals, and charging the battery.

​ Does it have a throttle or pedal assist?

Our bike has both a thumb throttle and a 5-speed pedal assist.

Built in the USA.

Enjoy the premium quality of American assembly paired with direct-to-consumer low prices and free shipping.

settings.heading: A Better Electric Bike, Inside and Out

settings.title: Built-in-the-USA Electric Bike
settings.subtitle: Made with carefully selected global components

settings.title: Order Direct Online & Save
settings.testimonial: Making sure you get the best features and components at rock bottom prices by dealing direct with our customers

settings.title: Be Riding in Just 5 Minutes
settings.testimonial: Unbox, put the pedals and handle bars on, grab ahold and go for a ride.

settings.title: Be Happy
settings.testimonial: Nothing beats enjoying the outdoors without a ton of effort!

settings.title: 750W Direct Drive Hub Motor
settings.testimonial: Direct Drive for simplicity and a quiet ride. Enjoy hill crushing power with durability and long term reliability.

settings.title: Samsung / LG 48V 13.6Ah  Battery
settings.testimonial: Made with PREMIUM Samsung Cells, our 48V battery will power you there and back again reliably for years.

settings.title: Dual Mechanical Disc Brakes
settings.testimonial: With 750 Watts of power, stopping is important. Dual Disc Brakes ensure brake responsiveness no-matter the power.

settings.title: Simulated Leather Seat
settings.testimonial: Best for comfort, best for style. Our premium seat will support you every mile and completes the metro vintage look.

settings.title: Multi-Function Backlit LCD
settings.testimonial: Large LCD Multifunction Display keeps track of your miles, battery info and more. Day and night modes.

settings.title: What's the big deal about being built in the USA?
settings.subtitle: Internationally assembled ebikes have no direct responsibility for quality control. When we assemble our globally sourced materials and components here in the U.S. we can hand-check the ebikes to our higher standard and eliminate the middle man, offering a more competitive price and a higher quality ebike.

settings.title: How much does the electric bike weigh?
settings.subtitle: The entire ebike weighs 59lbs with the battery installed, 50lbs without.

settings.title: How much can the electric bike support?
settings.subtitle: Our ebike can hold up to a 300lb payload riding in normal conditions

settings.title: If I order today, when will I get my electric bike?
settings.subtitle: Ebike availability is listed on the product page. Most bikes are in stock and ship within 2 business days. Our new models are currently available for pre-order

settings.title: What's the rider height range of the electric bike?
settings.subtitle: Riders from 5' to 6'6" can fit on the ebike with seat and handle bar adjustments. Our bike is HIGHLY adjustable. See a blog/review from a real customer. Click here to see the blog.

settings.title: What's the wheel size?
settings.subtitle: Our premium Whitewall wheels are 26” and 24" x 2.125” wide making them suitable for a wide variety of conditions with supreme comfort and handleability.

settings.title: Does it arrive fully assembled?
settings.subtitle: While we fully assemble the ebike to make sure it meets our quality standards, customers will have to put on the finishing touches of putting on the handlebars, twisting on the pedals, and charging the battery. Click here to see a video

settings.title: Does it have a throttle or pedal assist?
settings.subtitle: Our ebike has both a thumb throttle and a 5-speed pedal assist.

settings.title: What Class is your electric bike?
settings.subtitle: Our ebike is considered a class 2 ebike. The motor will assist you up to 20MPH and it does include a thumb throttle.

settings.title: What is your Warranty?
settings.subtitle: We have a 2 year warranty against manufacturer's defect with an optional 5 year available at checkout. Read the full warranty here.

settings.title: Do you offer a Men's electric bike?
settings.subtitle: The Step-through style of our Boogie Cruiser is intended to be for men and women. For more information click here.

settings.title: What are the specific dimensions of the bike?
